alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 8:42AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison, northwestern Carroll and northeastern Washington Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 842 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Garfield to 3 miles south of Tontitown to 3 miles west of Farmington. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Lowell... Farmington... Elkins... Tontitown... Greenland... Hindsville... Wesley... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... War Eagle... Drake Field Airport... Urbanette... Johnson... Goshen... Beaver Lake... Larue... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 58 and 75, and near mile marker 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
